long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension lets you easily save URLs from your browser to a Google Doc. With a single click, you can append the current tab's URL or all URLs from open tabs to a chosen document. Customize the target Google Doc ID and toggle debug mode in the settings. Visual feedback and keyboard shortcuts enhance usability, making URL collection swift and efficient.
